Frédéric Chopin

Twenty-four Préludes, op. 28

c. 1836–1838 · Chomiński 166–189 · Brown 100, 107, 123–124

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 37'

  • 1. C major
  • 2. A minor
  • 3. G major
  • 4. E minor
  • 5. D major
  • 6. B minor
  • 7. A major
  • 8. F-sharp minor
  • 9. E major
  • 10. C-sharp minor
  • 11. B major
  • 12. G-sharp minor
  • 13. F-sharp major
  • 14. E-flat minor
  • 15. D-flat major
  • 16. B-flat minor
  • 17. A-flat major
  • 18. F minor
  • 19. E-flat major
  • 20. C minor
  • 21. B-flat major
  • 22. G minor
  • 23. F major
  • 24. D minor

The préludes are spread over multiple entries in the Brown catalogue.

Brown cataloguepréludes
100nos. 7, 17
107nos. 3, 5–6, 8–9, 11–16, 18–20, 22–24
123nos. 2, 4, 10, 21
124no. 1

Recommended editions

  • Bärenreiter · BA 9610 · ed. Christoph Flamm
  • Henle · HN 882 · Préludes · ed. Norbert Müllemann [nos. 3 and 17 in two versions]
  • Henle · HN 883 · Préludes · ed. Norbert Müllemann [nos. 3 and 17 in two versions]
  • National Edition · 7 (A VII) · Preludes · ed. Jan Ekier
  • Peters · EP 7532 · Préludes · ed. Jean-Jacques Eigeldinger [nos. 3 and 17 in two versions]
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50005 · ed. Bernhardt Hansen
